articles.title: Stokes in World Cup squad after ending retirement
articles.description: Ben Stokes will be part of England's World Cup squad after reversing his decision to retire from one-day international cricket.
articles.content:
Ben Stokes will be part of England's World Cup squad after reversing his decision to retire from one-day international cricket.
Stokes is included in the 15-man squad for the series against New Zeal… [+4442 chars]
